titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Arnold L. Gesell, Director of the Clinic of Child Development, School of Medicine, Yale University, Case Study Records
Gesell (Arnold L), Director of the Clinic of Child Development, School of Medicine, Yale University, Case Study Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:13

did.unittitle: Arnold L. Gesell, director of the Clinic of Child Development, School of Medicine, Yale University, case study records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of case study records of Arnold L. Gesell as director of the Clinic of Child Development (later known as the Child Study Center), Yale School of Medicine.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Clinic of Child Development

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-E (YRG 27-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Medicine.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See inventory for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Arnold L. Gesell, Director of the Clinic of Child Development, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records (RU 783). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of case study records of Arnold L. Gesell as director of the Clinic of Child Development (later known as the Child Study Center), Yale School of Medicine.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by case number.
